item.title: Thank you for a courteous No
item.description: How we respond to the needs of others dictates our futures. We are all ready for a fight. Is this really the only option?

item.title: The people who say No
item.description: The only thing you need to remember is this: If someone wants to fight you, make sure you finish it.
